name: prueba-carga-login
description: Pruebas de carga automatizadas con Artillery

scripts.test:smoke: dotenv -e .env -- artillery run artillery.yml --environment smoke --record --output report_smoke.json
scripts.test:load: dotenv -e .env -- artillery run artillery.yml --environment production --record --output report_load.json
scripts.test:smoke:admin: dotenv -e .env -- artillery run artillery-admin.yml --environment smoke --record --output report_smoke_admin.json
scripts.test:load:admin: dotenv -e .env -- artillery run artillery-admin.yml --environment production --record --output report_load_admin.json
scripts.test:stress: dotenv -e .env -- artillery run artillery.yml --environment stress --record --output report_stress.json
scripts.test:stress:admin: dotenv -e .env -- artillery run artillery-admin.yml --environment stress --record --output report_stress_admin.json
scripts.report:smoke: npm run test:smoke && node generate-report.js report_smoke.json
scripts.report:load: npm run test:load && node generate-report.js report_load.json
scripts.report:smoke:admin: npm run test:smoke:admin && node generate-report.js report_smoke_admin.json
scripts.report:load:admin: npm run test:load:admin && node generate-report.js report_load_admin.json
scripts.report:stress: npm run test:stress && node generate-report.js report_stress.json
scripts.report:stress:admin: npm run test:stress:admin && node generate-report.js report_stress_admin.json
